title: Viewability-eligible-impressions
description: The advertising/viewability metric `viewability-eligible-impressions` describes the number of impressions that were eligible to measure viewability. An impression is eligible if the ad unit has a supported creative format and tag type.

@id.description: The unique identifier of this metric.

schema:name.description: The advertising/viewability metric `viewability-eligible-impressions` describes the number of impressions that were eligible to measure viewability. An impression is eligible if the ad unit has a supported creative format and tag type.

xdm:measurement.description: How to take measures of this metric.
